name: Crate Opener Simulator for TF2
description:
This is the Crate Opener Simulator for Team Fortless 2.

This game features Achievements, Inventory, Marketplace and trade-up contract.
There is over 100 different crates and over 1000 items, latest crate added was Rainy Day Series 106!

Opening crate costs you the key + crate price, but you are able to earn the money back by selling gathered items on different virtual marketplaces. 
To use trade-up contract you need 10 same grade items and you will be rewarded with one grade higher item.

• Over 100 crates from different series!
• Latest crate - Rainy Day Series 106 - included
• over 1000 items
• Real steam marketplace prices
• Inventory system
• Contract trade-up for TF2!
• Betting on real teams
• Item flipping
• Banking and loaning system
